components.name: general
components.html:
Card Titles

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dignissimos accusamus delectus deleniti, quibusdam commodi.
components.css:
<style type="text/css">
    .card {
        box-shadow: 4px 4px 40px 10px rgba(211, 211, 212, 0.15);
        background-color: #fff;
        padding: 1.5em;        
        padding-bottom: 0;
        width: 100%;
        min-height: 200px;
        border-radius: 8px;
    }

    .card-image {
        max-height: 120px;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        object-fit: cover;        
        border-radius: 8px;
    }

    .card-content {
        padding:1em 0;
    }

    .card-title {
        font-weight: bold;
    }

    .card-text {
        line-height: 1.6;
    }
  </style>

components.css:
<style type="text/css">
    .gwb-card {
        box-shadow: 4px 4px 40px 10px rgba(211, 211, 212, 0.15);
        background-color: #fff;
        padding: 1.5em;
        padding-bottom: 0;
        border-radius: 8px;
        width: 100%;
        min-height: 200px;
    }

    .gwb-card-image {
        max-height: 120px;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        object-fit: cover;        
        border-radius: 8px;
    }

    .gwb-card-content {
        padding:1em 0;
    }

    .gwb-card-title {
        font-weight: bold;
    }

    .gwb-card-text {
        line-height: 1.6;
    }

    .gwb-card-border {
        border: 1px solid #C4C4C4;
    }
  </style>
